Set.Text: Cannot gain settlers nor annex cities. Double the normal number of trade routes available. A Merchant of Venice appears after researching Optics. May purchase in puppeted cities. Puppets do not produce less science, gold, and faith than normal. Conquistadors can only settle abroad.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Cannot gain settlers nor annex cities. Double the normal number of trade routes available. A Merchant of Venice appears after researching Optics. May purchase in puppeted cities. Puppets do not produce less science, gold, and faith than normal. Conquistadors can only settle abroad.
